Package io.hbt.bubblegum.core.kademlia

Class BubblegumNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.hbt.bubblegum.core.kademlia.BubblegumNode
  • public class BubblegumNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a virtual Kademlia node.

                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> ids)
        Perform a query operation on a node.
        Parameters:
        id - The peer's NodeID.
        start - The start time of the query. UNIX time (seconds). Unused = -1.
        end - The end time of the query. UNIX time (seconds). Unused = -1.
        ids - The list of entity IDs to be returned. Unused = null.
        Returns:
        Returned Post object or null on failure.
